name: JavaScript
description: A versatile, high-level programming language essential for web development, JavaScript enables dynamic content, user interactions, and responsive design. Widely used in front-end development and also supported on the server side with Node.js.

name: React
description: A powerful JavaScript library developed by Facebook, React is used for building interactive user interfaces. It allows developers to create reusable components, making web applications more efficient and easier to manage.

name: React Native
description: An open-source framework by Facebook, React Native allows developers to build mobile applications using JavaScript and React principles, offering a unified experience across iOS and Android with native performance.

name: C
description: A foundational language in computer science, C is known for its efficiency and control over system resources. It is commonly used in system programming, embedded systems, and applications requiring high performance.

name: C++
description: An extension of C, C++ offers object-oriented capabilities and is widely used in software that demands high performance, such as games, operating systems, and real-time simulation applications.

name: C#
description: Developed by Microsoft, C# is a robust language for building applications on the .NET framework, especially suited for Windows applications, enterprise software, and game development with Unity.

name: Java
description: A widely-used, object-oriented programming language, Java is platform-independent and ideal for developing secure, large-scale applications, including Android apps, web servers, and enterprise solutions.

name: TypeScript
description: A typed superset of JavaScript, TypeScript enhances JavaScript by adding static typing, making code more predictable and maintainable. Itâ€™s particularly popular in large codebases and enterprise projects.

name: Python
description: Known for its readability and ease of use, Python is a versatile programming language popular in data science, web development, automation, and artificial intelligence. Its extensive libraries make it ideal for rapid development.

name: Django
description: A high-level Python web framework, Django promotes rapid development and clean design. It includes a range of built-in features for security, scalability, and ease of use, making it a preferred choice for backend development.
